invite.addExistingDesc: Enter the email address of an existing user to add them to this project. The user must already have an account.
invite.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
invite.roleTooltip: The role determines what permissions the user will have in this project
invite.roleUserDesc: Can create and edit own tickets
invite.roleAdminDesc: Can manage tickets and assign work
invite.roleManagerDesc: Read-only access with KPI and reports
invite.failedAdd: Failed to add user to project
review.feedbackExtra: Private notes visible only to managers and superadmins
review.feedbackPlaceholder: Add any additional feedback or notes...
review.privacyNote: This review is private and will NOT be visible to {{username}}. Only managers and superadmins can view user reviews.
createProject.keyPattern: Project key must be 2-10 uppercase letters or numbers (e.g., PROJ, TICKET)
createProject.keyTooltipShort: Short identifier for the project (2-10 uppercase characters)
createProject.nameMinLength: Project name must be at least 3 characters
createProject.nameMaxLength: Project name must be less than 100 characters
createProject.descMaxLength: Description must be less than 500 characters
createProject.descPlaceholder: Describe the purpose and scope of this project...
createProject.defaultColumnsNote: Default columns (To Do, In Progress, Review, Done) will be automatically created for this project.
